Text: I've watched this wonderful show for nearly 30 years and I'm heartbroken that it has ended.  When the cancellation was announced last April I decided to download and save the episodes.  I have the final year of the show now and if, in the future, I ever want to "visit" Llanview again I'll be able to.  I owe that to you, ClaudiaZ (and DVDveeken, before you).  Week after week, you took the time to upload each episode, without fail.  Saying thank you seems totally inadequate, but right now it's the best I can do.  From the bottom of my heart, thank you very much.
